typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct SchrodingersCat.Box storage ref))

nodes.documentation:
Create a box that is mapped to the sender address.
Initially the box is closed and the cat is in the superposition.
Only one box per sender address is possible.
nodes.name: createBox

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct SchrodingersCat.Box storage ref))
mapping(address => mapping(uint256 => struct SchrodingersCat.Box storage ref))

nodes.documentation: Opens the box and observes the contents of the box.
nodes.name: openBox

catIsAlive(uint256).notice: Returns True if the cat is alive, otherwise False.

createBox().notice: Create a box that is mapped to the sender address. Initially the box is closed and the cat is in the superposition. Only one box per sender address is possible.

openBox(uint256).notice: Opens the box and observes the contents of the box.
